The CCI badge portrays credibility and symbolizes an individual is qualified to provide the highest quality of instruction on Citrix products.

c5d3e0f6-66f6-495b-b215-55dd58949d1a.description: The Deploy Citrix SD-WAN via SD-WAN Orchestrator badge validates the fundamental knowledge and skills required to successfully plan and build a Citrix SD-WAN deployment through SD-WAN Orchestrator. It provides a single pane of glass management platform for Managed Service Providers to manage multiple Citrix SD-WAN customers centrally, with suitable role-based access controls, including the deployment options and leads to key tasks to quick setup, deploy and manage Citrix SD-WAN applications.

ebbfc990-366c-464a-a558-05b862ffca0e.description: Earners of this badge have committed to building a dedicated Customer Success Management team to drive customer adoption to Citrix services. They have gone through Instructor Led Training from the Citrix Customer Success Management team, completed a 13-week onboarding program, increased their customer's active usage of entitled Citrix services and collected positive NPS scores from their Citrix customers.
ebbfc990-366c-464a-a558-05b862ffca0e.name: Customer Success - Preferred Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Partner must have an active program membership in our Citrix Solution Advisor (CSA) program.
Partner must have at least one (1) employee who has a certified proficiency in Citrix Customer Success and Adoption course.
Partner must have at least one (1) employee at all times who will take on the responsibility of a Customer Success Manager and directly engage customers to drive adoption to Citrix services.
Partner's Customer Success Manager must attend the Instructor Led Training.
Partner's Customer Success Manager and Program Sponsor must fully participate in the 13-week onboarding phase post ILT.
Partner's Customer Success Manager must receive at least one (1) positive customer NPS score during the 13-week onboarding phase.
Partner's portfolio of customers must have positive increase in active usage of Citrix services at end of the 13-week onboarding phase.

Expiration of this badge will be at the discretion of the Citrix CSM Program Management. Cause for expiration could include but is not limited to; a partner no longer dedicating a CSM resource to customer engagement, a negative customer NPS score, a decrease in customer adoption to Citrix services, a decrease in retained Citrix customers.

58dcae9b-d56d-41e5-80c9-bfc45e8b69c1.description: The Citrix Technology Professional - Fellow (CTP-F) badge certifies that this person is an official lifetime member of the CTP program. Awardees engage with Citrix leaders to help Citrix shape the future of cloud computing technologies that enable mobile workstyles, providing valuable input on business needs and feedback on product strategy.
58dcae9b-d56d-41e5-80c9-bfc45e8b69c1.name: Citrix Technology Professional - Fellow

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is a lifetime achievement award in recognition of significant contributions to the Citrix community and CTP program.
